### Overview

The NGINX ingress controller exposes many useful metrics that can be scraped by a Prometheus server or agent. These metrics can inform you of ongoing process connections and the current ingress load that your system is handling. Furthermore, these metrics can inform you on ingress config reloads and empower alert conditions on config reload errors or unexpected config changes.



---

### About this Dashboard

This dashboard is based on metrics sent to New Relic using [Prometheus Agent or Prometheus Server.](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/prometheus-integrations/get-started/send-prometheus-metric-data-new-relic/)

For information on the prerequisites for this dashboard, please visit [our documentation here.](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/prometheus-integrations/integrations-list/i

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM Metric SELECT
if(latest(nginx_ingress_controller_config_last_reload_successful) < 1, 'Errors', 'No Errors') AS 'Last config reload errors'
FACET prometheus_server
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write'
AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}} )

FROM Metric SELECT latest(nginx_ingress_controller_config_last_reload_successful_timestamp_seconds) * 1000 as 'Last successful config reload' FACET prometheus_server where instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}} )
FROM Metric SELECT sum(nginx_ingress_controller_requests)  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}} ) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} ) facet status

SELECT (average(`__result_0`) * cardinality(`__result_0`)) AS 'Average process connections' FROM (
  FROM Metric SELECT
    average(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_connections_total) AS `__result_0`
  FACET prometheus_server, instance
  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write'
  AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}} )
  AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )
  TIMESERIES 60000 SLIDE BY 30000
)
FACET concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', instance)
TIMESERIES 30000

FROM Metric SELECT
  rate(sum(nginx_ingress_controller_request_size_count), 1 SECONDS)
FACET concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', instance, ' : ', status)
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write'
AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}} )
AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )
TIMESERIES 60000 SLIDE BY 10000

SELECT rate(sum(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_cpu_seconds_total), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric WHERE  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}} ) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )  TIMESERIES 60000 SLIDE BY 30000 facet concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', controller_pod)

SELECT rate(sum(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_resident_memory_bytes), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric WHERE  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( {{prometheus_server}} ) AND instance IN ( {{instance}} )  TIMESERIES 60000 SLIDE BY 30000 facet concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', controller_pod)
